mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TP_POST ( id, post_name, post_code, post_type_id, rank_id, status ) VALUES ( seq_TP_POST.nextval, #{post_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{post_code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{post_type_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rank_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update tp_post set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, post_code, post_name from tp_post where status = 1 and post_name = #{name}

select ep.id, ep.post_code, ep.post_name, ep.rank_id, ep.post_type_id from TP_POST ep where status != 0
and (ep.post_code like '%${searchInfo}%' or ep.post_name like '%${searchInfo}%')
order by ep.post_code
